com.anji.nn

Interface Connection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BiasConnection, CacheNeuronConnection, NeuronConnection, RandomConnection, StepHourglassConnection

    public interface Connection
    Abstract connection to carry data into neurons.
    Author:
    Philip Tucker
